remarks: Define the class of all posets (partially ordered sets) with weak ordering (e.g.  "less than or equal to" instead of "less than").  A poset is a relation which is transitive, reflexive, and antisymmetric.  (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2008.)
statement: df-ps $p |- PosetRel = { r | ( Rel r /\ ( r o. r ) C_ r /\ ( r i^i `' r ) = ( _I |` U. U. r ) ) } $.
